entries.journal_entry_description: You know that Kavas is using K' Cur and his gang to ambush Kavas? own smugglers. You now have to get the evidence that will convince Lady Valarian that her right hand woman is a traitor.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Null node to hang the tasks off
entries.task01_message_box_text: The gang has a 'hot tip' from someone inside Lady Valarian's organization. They are going to take out a smuggler coming into town. Protect the smuggler and get evidence that Kavas is behind the operation.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The gang has a 'hot tip' from someone inside Lady Valarian's organization. They are going to take out a smuggler coming into town. Escort the smuggler into town, kill the ambush team and get evidence that Kavas is behind the operation.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: What are you doing! Kavas set this operation up so that we would get the goods! What are you playing at?
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Ind with your copy of the incriminating communication from K' Cur about Kavas setting up the hit on the smuggler.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: The gang has a 'hot tip' from someone inside Lady Valarian's organization. They are going to take out a smuggler coming into town. Protect the smuggler and get evidence that Kavas is behind the operation.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: The gang has a 'hot tip' from someone inside Lady Valarian's organization. They are going to take out a smuggler coming into town. Escort the smuggler into town, kill the ambush team and get evidence that Kavas is behind the operation.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: The gang has a 'hot tip' from someone inside Lady Valarian's organization. They are going to take out a smuggler coming into town. Escort the smuggler into town, kill the ambush team and get evidence that Kavas is behind the operation.
